GET /api.description: serves up a json representation of all the available endpoints of the api

GET /api/topics.description: serves an array of all topics

GET /api/articles.description: serves an array of all articles, articles are sorted by date in descending order, total count of all the comments with this article_id as one of the properties

GET/api/articles/:article_id.description: serves an array of an articles with the given article_id

articles.title: Living in the shadow of a great man
articles.author: butter_bridge

GET /api/articles/:article_id/comments.description: serves an array of all coments of the given article
